verbs.description: [ARG0: investigators] [V: try] [ARG1: to determine cause of sebring gyroplane crash] federal investigators were in sebring wednesday trying to figure out why a gyroplane with two people on board crashed into a mobile home park shortly after taking off tuesday sebring regional airport chris lord fox national transportation safety board manatee county sebring airport brian rayner dr chris brugger manatee county florida zach easton ntsb dr chris brugger
